structure.unit: ESCAPES, FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE, AND EXTRADITION

law.text: Nothing in KRS 440.450 to 440.510 or in the agreement on detainers shall be construed to require the application of KRS 532.080 to any person on account of any conviction had in a proceeding brought to final disposition by reason of the use of said agreement.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 301, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 219, sec. 4.
